channel.title: Couple questions

item.title: Couple questions
item.dc:creator: @bmw981 bmw981
item.description:
@bmw981 wrote:

I attempted to make some stupid code

         if(playerLevel[3] <= 0); //dissappearing scythe
if(playerHasItem(1419)==false); {
      sendMessage("");
}
/*else if(playerHasItem(1419)==true); {
      deleteItem(1419);
      sendMessage("don't worry, your scythe disappeared");
}

But when i compile it says “Else without if” and um… call me a dumb ass but i’m pretty damn sure it says if right after else.

also in my server the wild magically stopped working, so when you go to pk you can’t attack with melee, mage, or range. You can use vengeance tho. Can anyone tell me why this may be? thanks.

Read full topic
